\name{Playmaker}
\alias{Playmaker}
\title{Playmaker}
\usage{
Playmaker <- (PLAYER_NAME, AST, TOV)
}
\arguments{
\item{PLAYER_NAME}{The name of the player}
\item{AST}{Players average assists per game}
\item{TOV}{Players average turnovers per game}
}
\description{
Rate a players ability to run an offense for a team
}
\examples{
Playmaker("Lebron James", 11.4, 2.1)
}
